pre-build.command:
ROOT="$PWD"
case "$PWD" in
  */.mooncakes/*)
    ROOT="${PWD%%/.mooncakes/*}"
    ;;
esac

PKG_WGPU="$ROOT/.mooncakes/Milky2018/wgpu_mbt/vendor/wgpu-native"
if [ -d "$PKG_WGPU" ]; then
  mkdir -p "$ROOT/vendor"
  if [ ! -e "$ROOT/vendor/wgpu-native" ]; then
    ln -s "$PKG_WGPU" "$ROOT/vendor/wgpu-native"
  fi
fi

MANIFEST="$input"
if [ ! -f "$MANIFEST" ]; then
  if [ -f "$PKG_WGPU/Cargo.toml" ]; then
    MANIFEST="$PKG_WGPU/Cargo.toml"
  elif [ -f "$ROOT/vendor/wgpu-native/Cargo.toml" ]; then
    MANIFEST="$ROOT/vendor/wgpu-native/Cargo.toml"
  fi
fi

cargo build --manifest-path "$MANIFEST" --release --no-default-features --features metal,wgsl
